name: garden.richardhaines.dev
description: The new home for my digital garden. A fun space for me to experiment with stuff, write tutorials and store my thoughts and notes

name: devpack.dev
description: A SaaS to keep your personal branding consistent across multiple platforms. Manage your social presence, media and domains from one hub. Current status: ALPHA

name: serverless-graphql-potter
description: This is a side project that i used to understand how serverless functions work. I decided to use the potter api as i love the world of harry potter. Built with Gatsby, Netlify functions, Apollo and FaunaDB. Data provided via the Potter API.
